content: description bust your stash with style this easy crochet square uses small amounts of yarn in bold rounds ideal for using up scraps and experimenting with color materials 5 colors of dk or worsted weight yarn scraps work perfectly this square shines in bright bold colors yarn a - pink yarn b - yellow yarn c - white yarn d - turquoise yarn e - lime green tools crochet hook size 5 mm/us h-8 or size appropriate for your yarn yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors blocking mat + pins optional for best results skill level advanced beginner
